sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup} from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../../utils/calculateAvgRating' const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() const tour = tourData.find(tour=> tour.id === id ) const {photo, title, desc, price, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize} = tour const {totalRating, avg} = calculateAvgRating(reviews) return ( <>

{title}

{city} {avgRating === 0? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ('Not rated' ): ( ({reviews.lenght}) )}
) } export default TourDetails
